念.definition: to read; to study (a subject); to attend (a school); to read aloud; to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4]); to miss (sb); idea; remembrance; twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])

念佛.definition: to pray to Buddha; to chant the names of Buddha

念叨.definition: to talk about often; to reminisce about; to keep repeating; to keep harping on; to discuss

念咒.definition: to chant a magic spell; to recite incantations

念學位.definition: to study for a degree; to take a degree course

念念有詞.definition: to mumble; to mutter to oneself

念想.definition: to miss (the presence of); to cherish the memory of; aspiration; desire; sth one keeps thinking about; (coll.) keepsake; memento; (coll.) impression (of sb or sth in one's mind)

念想兒.definition: (coll.) keepsake; memento; (coll.) impression (of sb or sth in one's mind)

念書.definition: to read; to study; to attend school

念珠.definition: prayer beads; rosary; rosary beads; CL:串[chuan4]

念經.definition: to recite or chant Buddhist scripture

念舊.definition: to remember old friends; to cherish old friendships; for old time's sake

念茲在茲.definition: see 念念不忘[nian4 nian4 bu4 wang4]

念誦.definition: to read out; to recite; to remember sb (while talking about sth else)
